synopsis: Yuuko runs into trouble when she and Miki Saotome of the Tsubame Group go after the same unlicensed Monster.
A large dept sets the Mobile Shinsengumi into motion to find a way to pay it off.

title.jp: The Skin is Dyed in the Cloud of Steam

synopsis: Yuuko tries to set up Sazaku and Ryuunosuke, while Gennai convinces Nekomata to participate in an experiment.

title.jp: How Play Time Leads to Fighting and Rumors

synopsis: Yuuko, Toshie, and Kaoru try to teach Ryuunosuke the wonders of women, when he meets Koyuki.
Miki and Ukon summon a monster to kill Ryuunosuke. Gennai creates a mechanical marionette of Toshie's mother that goes berserk!

title.jp: True Colors of Okita!? Ryunosuke, Details of his Love!?

synopsis: A handsome celebrity is in town, Yuuko means to have him flirt with Sazaku to make Ryuunosuke jealous, but he is really looking for something else.

title.jp: Praying to the Gods to Find the Whereabouts of Love

synopsis: Kaoru summons a Goddess to grant a wish to have Sazaku and Ryuunosuke to fall in love, even though she has feelings for Ryuunosuke.
Nekomata revives Ryuunosuke when he dies, but gives him a girl's soul!

title.jp: The Feelings for One`s Mother Are Reflected in the Moon

synopsis: The Mobile Shinsengumi is after a monster disguised as a candy man who is stealing children's spirit.

title.jp: How Losing One`s Way Leads to Sorrow

synopsis: Licensed Monsters have started disappearing all over town, especially at the World's Fair. When the Mobile Shinsengumi start to investigate, they find that they are facing the Tsubame Group again.

title.jp: Hello From the Countries of the World

synopsis: Ryuunosuke's fiance shows up and causes all kinds of trouble. Ryuunosuke must marry her to pay off the debt he has to her father for bringing him back to life.

title.jp: Ghosts that Came from the Eastern Countries (Part One)

synopsis: Miki and Ukon meet a vampire, while Yuuko is trying to keep Ryuunosuke and his fiance from leaving.

title.jp: Ghosts that Came from the Eastern Countries (Part Two)

synopsis: Oryou hands over the Mobile Shinsengumi Company to the Tsubame Group, and starts a new company under Ryuunosuke. The vampire Montague kidnaps Ryuunosuke's fiance to lure him into a trap.
